title: We can't have champion reveals like this.

embed.description: Learn More about Ornn: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/us/featured/champion-reveal-ornn More than most demi-gods, Ornn values his privacy. Dwelling in solitude beneath an ancient volcano, he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten stone to forge items of unsurpassed quality. Yet from these depths, Ornn senses trouble; divine beings are once again meddling in mortal affairs.

body:
It's badly edited with horrible music, doesn't say too much about personality of Ornn, I don't feel hype anymore. 
If you really want to make videos like this upload them to Facebook and Imgur, not on Youtube.  Sorry for butthurting.

replies.body:
Sigh. This shouldn't have gone out the way that it did. I had a very strong reaction to it as well and was then given context. Please be assured this was not an intended release in this fashion, or a part of the Ornn promotional campaign. 

That said. Ornnward to more content!
Glad to hear that because as much as it can be fun it really worked in throwing down the epic feeling.

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-08-08T16:21:20.873+0000)
>
> Glad to hear that because as much as it can be fun it really worked in throwing down the epic feeling.

TBH, knowing what I know about Ornn's personality. He wouldn't mind what you just said.
"Meh. Disappointed. Moving on. Do better next time." - Ornn.
Soooooo... what happened to more content. *Cough cough* Stream *Cough cough*

> [{quoted}](name=Archer530,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=0001000100000002,timestamp=2017-08-08T22:28:48.778+0000)
>
> Soooooo... what happened to more content. *Cough cough* Stream *Cough cough*

http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/tales-of-ornn
Already read that. Good story, just kinda sad a multi million dollar indie company is unable to get a small 1 hour stream up. Also when's Ornn up on PBE?

Guessed so by the lines and how the ultimate works (_"Bad fire ram! go back and knock those guys up!"_).

But first you need an epic introduction xD

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-08T16:13:40.750+0000)
>
> Sigh. This shouldn't have gone out the way that it did. I had a very strong reaction to it as well and was then given context. Please be assured this was not an intended release in this fashion, or a part of the Ornn promotional campaign. 
> 
> That said. Ornnward to more content!

Can I ask how you unintentionally released a video in the first place?

> [{quoted}](name=Epicanian,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-08-08T20:26:08.816+0000)
>
> Can I ask how you unintentionally released a video in the first place?

wires get crossed sometimes. it's really not much of a big deal.
Tho i feel that the horn and singing teaser was spot on, something like this, a facebook style video, should only really be used right before the patch notes come out with ornn rather as a reveal
Yeah even now I listen to the teaser! It's amazing I need the lyrics to sing along.

Lemme guess. The video was outsourced for time constraints with the star guardian and arcade events being produced in-house, but Lol's reveal theme key points weren't communicated thoroughly to the marketing agency and they spawned this very generic piece of... facebook content. Then by the time you got the video back you had nothing proper in time for the reveal and had to just suck it up and release this as it is. How much did I get right?
Nope.

then nvm XD

Edit: Reading more, now I guess it was just that the video was uploaded on social platforms it wasn't supposed to be uploaded on. I still dislike very much the new format in which champions are revealed, but I guess it makes sense to communicate content in the way platform user's are expecting to be "talked to"
Any chance the real release is laying around and we could see it at some point?

> [{quoted}](name=The12thman94,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=00010005,timestamp=2017-08-08T21:02:41.312+0000)
>
> Any chance the real release is laying around and we could see it at some point?

There isn't something that did not get released. The order got messed up, that's all.
So i take it there was some miscommunication in the ranks?

Thank you for the reply! I was scared when I saw the video. I thought "Is this the future of Lol?"
Also I saw someone anwser the question on Reddit after I submmitted this post :D

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-08T16:13:40.750+0000)
>
> Sigh. This shouldn't have gone out the way that it did. I had a very strong reaction to it as well and was then given context. Please be assured this was not an intended release in this fashion, or a part of the Ornn promotional campaign. 
> 
> That said. Ornnward to more content!

does it mean more than the typical livestream, QA and champ spotlight?
They've already said it should have only be released on Facebook, and not on YouTube

> [{quoted}](name=TouchFluffyTaiI,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-08T06:46:01.360+0000)
>
> They've already said it should have only be released on Facebook, and not on YouTube

Yup! Thanks :)
That music gave me cancer. Jesus wtf is that? Can you imagine Riot releasing a champion with Bad Romance by Lady Gaga playing in the background? wtf
I remember my first time with Windows Movie Maker...
The only good thing was the peak at his lines.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=azcHAUt5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-08T16:19:38.388+0000)
>
> The only good thing was the peak at his lines.

"You like that? I do."
